tool_description: ⚽️ ⚽️  Introducing the Ultimate Football API: Your Key to the World of Soccer Stats and Insights! 🌍  We support more than 200 leagues! Are you ready to take your football-related project, website, or app to the next level? Look no further, as our Football API is here to provide you with the most comprehensive and up-to-date football data in the industry! We also provide live odds for multiple markets!
name: The Fooball API
title: The Fooball API

api_list.name: Match Statistics
api_list.description: Returns Statistics about a given match_id. The match does not have to be necessarily live but also finished. You can retrieve Match IDs from the Football Live Matches endpoint.

required_parameters.name: match_id
required_parameters.description: You can retrieve Match IDs from the Football Live Matches endpoint.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://the-fooball-api.p.rapidapi.com/football/match_details/10113877"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-fooball-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://the-fooball-api.p.rapidapi.com/football/match_details/{match_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-fooball-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Leagues By Nation ID
api_list.description: Get the list of all leagues we suppport by the Nation ID.

required_parameters.name: nation_id
required_parameters.description: Get this value from the Get Nation ID endpoint

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://the-fooball-api.p.rapidapi.com/football/leagues_ids/31"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-fooball-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://the-fooball-api.p.rapidapi.com/football/leagues_ids/{nation_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-fooball-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Live Scores
api_list.description: Returns Football Live Matches with betting odds.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://the-fooball-api.p.rapidapi.com/football/live"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-fooball-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Odds by Match ID
api_list.description: Here you can retrieve odds for multiple markets from the Match ID.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: You can retrieve Match IDs from the Football Live Matches endpoint.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://the-fooball-api.p.rapidapi.com/get_odds/11352563"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-fooball-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://the-fooball-api.p.rapidapi.com/get_odds/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-fooball-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Nation ID
api_list.description: With this endpoint you can get the nation id to be used in the leagues endpoint.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://the-fooball-api.p.rapidapi.com/football/nation_ids"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-fooball-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Match Lineups
api_list.description: Returns LineUps about a given match_id. The match does not have to be necessarily live but also finished. You can retrieve Match IDs from the Football Live Matches endpoint.

required_parameters.name: match_id
required_parameters.description: You can retrieve Match IDs from the Football Live Matches endpoint.

api_list.code:

url = "https://the-fooball-api.p.rapidapi.com/football/match_lineups/10113877"

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-fooball-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
